infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs camera access to scan Emirates ID cards.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs photo library access to upload Emirates ID images.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow SN Travels EID Staff to access your camera to scan Emirates ID cards.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow SN Travels EID Staff to access your photos to upload Emirates ID images.
